Its England vs PERIOD Spain in the FIFA Womens World Cup final big leaguers put on a show at the Little League World Series and the NFL plays more practice games PERIOD Heres a preview of the best sports to watch this weekend and next week

All Times EasternCentral PERIOD

MLB Baseball

FOX 76c

Viewers will see either the New Mets at the St PERIOD Louis Cardinals or the Detroit Tigers at the Cleveland Guardians on FOXs Thursday night regional MLB broadcast PERIOD

NFL Preseason Cleveland at Philadelphia

NFL Network 730630c

The Philadelphia Eagles welcome the Cleveland Browns to Phillys Lincoln Financial Field for the kickoff of NFL preseason Week  PERIOD

FIFA Womens World Cup Third Place Match

FOX 4a3a c

The losing teams from the semifinal round Australia and Sweden meet at Suncorp Stadium in Milton Australia to determine the FIFA Womens World Cup thirdplace team PERIOD

NFL Preseason

NFL Network beginning at 1noon c

NFL Network airs four Week  NFL preseason games with the Jacksonville Jaguars at the Detroit Lions the Miami Dolphins at the Houston Texans the Chicago Bears at the Indianapolis Colts and the Dallas Cowboys at the Seattle Seahawks PERIOD

FIFA Womens World Cup Final

FOX 6a5a c

The FIFA Womens World Cup soccer tournament concludes Sunday with the championship match between England and Spain at Sydneys Stadium Australia PERIOD

NASCAR Cup Series Go Bowling at The Glen

USA Network 32c

Watkins Glen International in New York brings top Cup Series stars William Byron Kyle Busch Martin Truex Jr. Ross Chastain and others to compete for  laps around the .454mile road course PERIOD

MLB Baseball Little League Classic Washington vs PERIOD Philadelphia

ESPN 76c

The sixth annual event featuring MLB teams playing at Historic Bowman Field in Williamsport Pennsylvania features the Washington Nationals vs PERIOD the Philadelphia Phillies PERIOD

NFL Preseason New Orleans at L.A PERIOD Chargers

NFL Network 76c

NFL Network airs a Week  preseason matchup with the New Orleans Saints at the L.A PERIOD Chargers at SoFi Stadium in Inglewood California PERIOD

NFL Preseason Baltimore at Washington

ESPN 87c

The Baltimore Ravens visit the Washington Commanders for a Week  preseason game on ESPNs Monday Night Football PERIOD

NFL Preseason

NFL Network  Prime Video beginning at 730630c

The third and final week of the NFL preseason kicks off with the Pittsburgh Steelers at the Atlanta Falcons on NFL Network followed by the Indianapolis Colts at the Philadelphia Eagles on Prime Video PERIOD
